parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region of the organization to which the owner of the certificate belongs. Valid values: ap-southeast-1 and cn-hangzhou.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource.\
Default value: **instance**

Valid values:

*   instance: certificate order
*   Certificate: certificate
